colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B CHOS SMRAS BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, ,MDZAD PA'I BSANGS MCHOG MCHOD SPRIN RGYA MTSO DANG, ,RIN CHEN PHRENG BA GNYIS KA GZHIR BYAS NAS, ,'DON CHA GO RIM BSGRIGS 'DI YIN NI, ,HAR HANG DZAS SANG RIN CHEN RDO RJE YIS, ,BSOD NAMS BSAGS PA'I DON DU BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ,RANG GZHAN GNYIS LA PHAN PA'I BSAM PA YIS, ,DGE SLONG GZUGS CAN DGE BSHES KHRO MI BRIS, ,RANG BZO MIN PAR RNAM DAG GZHUNG LAS 'BYUNG, ,YID MCHE'I GNAS SU BZHAG NA BKRA SHIS 'PHEL, ,BAG CHAGS BZHAG NAS BRIS PA'I DGE BA 'DIS, ,'GRO KUN GNAS SKABS NYER TSE ZHI BA DANG, ,LO PHYOGS 'PHEL ZHING NOR 'BRU TSE DPAL 'PHEL, ,MTHAR THUG RNAM MKHYEN THOB PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS SO, ,
